wikitext.*:
'''*mēnie''' is a [[Quenya]] word variously rendered as "determination"<ref>{{PE|17}}</ref>{{rp|94}}, "impulse"<ref name=impulse>{{NM|Impulse}}</ref>, or "device" (in the sense of "something devised or contrived for bringing about some end or result”, or "purpose, intention”)<ref name=impulse />{{rp|note 9}}

== Examples ==
* [[ammēnie]]
* [[Ermenië]]

== Etymology ==
It is thought to be the gerundial form of the [[Sundocarme|root]] [[MEN]] ("move", "proceed")<ref>https://www.elvish.org/Tengwestie/articles/Hostetter/elvishreincarnationgloss.phtml</ref>

{{references}}
